sqlMap.select: $option$ select intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype,count(distinct(nmImsi)), #intYear#,#intMonth#,#intWeek#,#intDay#,getdate(),#vcLocalIP# ,count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from $sourceTableName$ sourceTable left join dtbGroupTree tree on sourceTable.nmDimensId = tree.nmDimensId where nmTypeId = 1 and nmLevelsId = 2 group by intBscId,nmParentId,nmGroupId,intRaitype
